Posts.Content:
I HAD MY MAMMOGRAM DONE THIS MAY 10 2012, LIKE A WEEK AGO. AND I LIKE TO KNOW IF IT'S NORMAL TO RECIEVE A CALL A WEEK LATER MAY 16TH 2012. CONCERNING THE MAMMOGRAM, SHOULD I BE FREAKED OUT. I DO RECALL HAVING ONE DONE IN 1995 BUT I CAN'T REMEMBER IF THE DOCTOR CALLED ME BACK TO DISCUSS THE MAMMOGRAM .. AM 51 YEARS OF AGE, AND AM SCARED.. THE DOCTOR HAS ME BOOKED THIS FRIDAY MAY 18TH, 2012..AND I HAVE TO WAIT 2 DAYS GOOD GOSH WHY DO THE DOCTORS DO THAT TO PATIENTS? 
 had my mammogram done this May 10th 2012, like a week ago. I want to know if it's normal to
 get a call to go see the doctor May 16th 2012 concerning the mammogram ..
Posts.Title: Very Scared- Got the Dreaded Call Back
